price: 7. Kan ladani wax ha ka bixiyo maalka loo waasiciyey, kiina ilaha ay wax ka soo galaan cidhiidhi yihiin, ha bixiyo wax ka mid ah wuxuu Alle siiyey. Alle kuma kallifo nafna wuxuusan siin. Alle wuxuu keeni  faraj iyo fudayd dhibaatada kaddib.
arabic: لِيُنفِقۡ ذُو سَعَةٖ مِّن سَعَتِهِۦۖ وَمَن قُدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ رِزۡقُهُۥ فَلۡيُنفِقۡ مِمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُ ٱللَّهُۚ لَا يُكَلِّفُ ٱللَّهُ نَفۡسًا إِلَّا مَآ ءَاتَىٰهَاۚ سَيَجۡعَلُ ٱللَّهُ بَعۡدَ عُسۡرٖ يُسۡرٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: liyunfiq dhū saʿatin min saʿatihi waman qudira ʿalayhi riz'quhu falyunfiq mimmā ātāhu al-lahu lā yukallifu al-lahu nafsan illā mā ātāhā sayajʿalu al-lahu baʿda ʿus'rin yus'ran
